title: The Importance of Courage
blurb: The importance of courage through the lens of character development.

vocab.definition: The ability to do something that frightens you.
A person in a story, movie, or play.
The process of growing or improving.
The activity of telling or writing stories.
Hard times or difficult situations that test you.
The ability to recover after a setback or failure.
Doing the right thing even when no one is watching.
A decision about what is right or wrong.
What happens because of a choice or action.
Something that gets in the way of reaching a goal.
Trying something that might be dangerous or might not work.
The main character in a story.

teachingNotes: The life skill of courage told through the conduit of storytelling.

sample.A: Courage is the ability to do something that frightens you.

sample.Q: Why is courage important in stories?
sample.A: Courage is important in stories because it helps characters face challenges and grow.

sample.Q: How can a character show courage?
sample.A: A character can show courage by standing up for what is right, even when it's hard.

sample.Q: Give an example of a courageous act.
sample.A: An example of a courageous act is helping someone in need even if you're scared.
Character development is how a character changes and grows throughout a story.

sample.Q: How does courage affect character development?
sample.A: Courage affects character development by helping characters overcome fears and become stronger.

sample.Q: Can you name a story where a character shows courage?
sample.A: In the story of 'The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe,' Aslan shows courage by facing the White Witch.

truefalse.Q: Bravery and courage are the same thing.
A character can grow without courage.
Courage is only for heroes in stories.
Every character in a story shows courage.

shortanswer.Q: Why do stories often include courageous characters?
shortanswer.A: To show how characters can overcome challenges and grow.

shortanswer.Q: What is one way a character might show courage?
shortanswer.A: By standing up for someone else in the story.
expectedAny: stand up for what is right

shortanswer.Q: How does courage help in real life?
shortanswer.A: It helps people face their fears and try new things.

shortanswer.Q: Give an example of a courageous character from a story you know.
shortanswer.A: Harry Potter shows courage by facing Voldemort.

shortanswer.Q: What might happen if a character lacks courage?
shortanswer.A: They might struggle to face challenges or grow.

shortanswer.Q: How can courage change a story's outcome?
shortanswer.A: It can lead to a positive resolution or victory.

shortanswer.Q: Why is courage considered a life skill?
shortanswer.A: Because it helps people handle difficult situations.
